subject: WORD BANK FUNDS INVESTIGATIO
body:
WORD BANK FUNDS INVESTIGATION UNIT.
FBI.Headquarters
935 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW
Washington, DC 20535 USA
Good Day,
With Due Respect    
This is to bring to your notice that a cash payment of US$2,000,000.00 being a compensation payment for being an online victim of internet Fraud/Scam has been issued to your name and the sum will be paid thought any of our corresponding bank, before receiving your fund, you are to contact our payment office with your personal details for verification, re-activation of payment:
Full name: ................
Country and address: ..................
Phone: ....................
Sex:.......................
Years:.......................
Occupation:................
copy of your identity document: .........
Upon verification of your data, you will be notified about the requirements for the approval of your fund.
Furthermore, the endorsement fee will cost you the sum of US$350 (Three  hundred and fifty dollars only) after which our headquarters will authorize any of our corresponding bank  to carry out the transfer of your fund to your designated bank account or we can as well deliver the fund to your home through diplomatic meance.Contact us immediately for further clarification regarding your payment.
Sincerely,
Mr.Alexander Titolo
Agent Representative.

subject: Re:   WORD BANK FUNDS INVESTIGATIO
body:
Hello Agent Titolo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this cash payment. Could you please provide more details about how my name was selected for this? Also, could you explain a bit more about the nature of this internet Fraud Scam?

I'm also curious about the payment process. Why is there a fee involved and what exactly does it cover? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christian

subject: compensation fund
body:
Dear Mr Christian
Thanks for your response and of course we got your contact email through
the internet net work online during our research and quest for this
compensation . So you should consider yourself lucky as one of the
beneficiaries .
Meanwhile the payment process is to be chosen by you either through wire
transfer (TT) to your nominated bank account or via a post dated Check or
bank draft that can be delivered to your doorstep after the handling and
insurance fee is paid.

Yes the $350 is the only fee required to cover all processes associated
with the protocols involved to ensure that you received this approved
compensation .
Therefore please kindly send your full details including your address and
contact phone numbers for easy and faster communication , so that i can
refer you to the two paying banks for further communications .
Thanks and best wishes
Mr Alexander

subject: Re: compensation fund
body:
Hello Mr. Alexander,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I must say, I'm quite thrilled to be considered lucky! 

Regarding the payment process, could you please elaborate a bit more on how each method works? Specifically, I'm interested in understanding the differences between wire transfer TT and post-dated check or bank draft.

Also, could you provide more information about the handling and insurance fee? How much is it exactly and what does it cover?

I appreciate your assistance with this matter.

Best wishes,
Christian

subject: Re: compensation fund
body:
Hello Mr. Alexander,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I must say, I'm quite thrilled to be considered lucky! 

I'm curious about the payment process you mentioned. Could you please elaborate more on how the wire transfer TT works? Also, could you provide more information about the post-dated check or bank draft option?

Regarding the handling and insurance fee, could you kindly clarify what this fee covers specifically? And how is it calculated?

As for my details, I'd prefer to understand more about these processes before sharing any personal information. I hope that's okay.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christian
